title: Match 100% completion celebration modal UI/message to provided reference in Time-Bound targets - 2026

requirements.text: In the “Time-Bound targets - 2026” (Yearly Summary Table) view, ensure the 100% completion celebration modal visually and textually matches the provided reference screenshots (image-6.png, image-7.png), including the same headline style, emoji usage, and message copy.

quotes: In the view Time-Bound targets - 2026, If a month reaches 100% completion, display a Modal with the same message and image like in the picture.

acceptanceCriteria: When a month transitions to 100% completion, the modal appears and the headline and body text match the reference screenshots (including punctuation/ellipsis and emojis).
The modal retains a close (X) control in the top-right and can be dismissed via the X and the secondary action without breaking the summary table interaction.

requirements.text: Update the celebration modal media area so that, when no user selfie has been selected yet, it displays a built-in default celebration image matching the reference screenshot’s layout (instead of an empty placeholder area). Keep the existing behavior to show the user-selected selfie once provided.

quotes: display a Modal with the same message and image like in the picture.

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the modal without selecting a selfie shows the default celebration image.
After selecting a selfie, the modal shows the selected selfie preview (replacing the default image).
Closing and reopening the modal resets back to the default celebration image (until a new selfie is selected).

requirements.text: Add the new default celebration image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it directly from the modal component (do not route images through the backend).

quotes: display a Modal with the same message and image like in the picture.

acceptanceCriteria: The default celebration image is present in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and loads correctly in the modal in dev and production builds.

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not change backend canister logic; this modal behavior remains client-only.
Keep the existing trigger logic: the modal opens only when a month transitions to 100% completion and the month has at least one goal.
nonGoals: Adding backend persistence for the Yearly Summary checkbox state.
Implementing actual sharing to social media or external services.

required: Photo-like celebratory portrait image for modal default state (celebration-default-photo.dim_900x700.png)
